MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole, affecting properties in Kirklandhill Path and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.11am. Repairs are taking longer than expected and our team are continuing to investigate the fault and we expect to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.09am on Tuesday 12th January 2021.
